short_summary: Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) requires a chartered vessel to retrieve and deploy science equipment around the south coast of Vancouver Island.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Tender Title
F1625-220093: Salish Sea Multi-Day Vessel Charter

### Tender Details

* **Procurement Number:** WS3717242851
* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-13
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-10T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-01-20
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-01-12

### Tender Description
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) requires a chartered vessel to transport and retrieve science equipment around the south coast of Vancouver Island, including Swiftsure Bank, Juan de Fuca Strait, Haro Strait, Boundary Pass, and Strait of Georgia.

### Tender Status
This tender is currently **expired**.

### Key Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Delivery Regions:** British Columbia
* **End User Entities:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Zwarich, Eric (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [eric.zwarich@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.zwarich@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Documents

The full tender announcement and supporting documents can be accessed at <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14885221?extsite=MTQ4ODUyMjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>. I
will review this rewritten text for compliance and content accuracy. Looking for feedback!

Please let me know how I did!
